description: child seated on a ledge, wearing straw hat and heavy jacket, holding roughly spherical object to mouth; profile view
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Stamp and Label

on right, in pencil: various inscriptions; LRC, in pencil: [A03-200 00]
markings: bottom left, black stamp; UR: label with title, artist\'s name and address
signed: below image on mount, right, in pencil: [C.J. MARVIN]; LRC in image, in brown: [C.J. MARVIN]; on verso, in pencil: [No 5 / IDLE MOMENTS / C.J. MARVIN / SOUTH PASADENA CALIF.]
title: Idle Moments
